name: Paccade
description:
Pacman but in a new style!

---

CONTROLS

--

Move left: A or Left Arrow

Move right: D or Right Arrow

Eat attack: Space

Cancel eat attack: Space

Restart: R

You can get combo bonuses if you eat multiple apples in one attack.

--

Made in a day for Bored Pixels Jam 2. Concept, programming, art, music and sound effects all by matharoo.
